marklogic.body:
did a great job, eh? what, when it is discovered the fix is in, that will be the dem. argument? wasn't this swing voter the one who 'went where no case law had gone before' on roevwade? hmmmm
anyway, when speaking to large crowds, if you are not quick on you feet, , Always have a back up plan.
for example: "excuse me your honors, but i believe i may have swallowed a bug, Cough, Cough". almost anything will probably do.. heck, by the time the exterminators were finished and the building aired out, he may have even gotten some press sympathy.
headline: lawyer for obama chokes on insect while speaking, doctors said ... arguments to resume tomorrow.
this guy represents the obama team way. one screwup after the next. at least this h.c. abomination is one (of many) we can get rid of w/o any more serious damage. American's can do better than this. we have the finest treatment in the world, we just need to protect it from the likes of the evil 3 stooges.
